list.title: Indian Sandstone Patio
list.desc: Our ever-popular Indian Sandstone paving slabs. All our paving work is laid on tarram, hardcore and a wet mortar base. Raised planters built using new pressure-treated sleepers with the addition of low voltage LED lights.
